A-FRAME Registry

A curated collection of A-Frame ready-to-use components
also available from within the A-Frame Inspector

The Registry is currently being populated. See awesome-aframe and the blog for more components!

  • Alongpath

    protyze September 30th 2016 © GPL-3.0 ★ 17

    A-Frame Component that allows entities to follow predefined paths

    aframe-alongpath-component.min.js on GitHub

  • Animation

    Kevin Ngo June 1st 2016 © MIT ★ 327

    Animations in A-Frame using anime.js

    aframe-animation-component.min.js on GitHub

  • Audioanalyser

    Kevin Ngo June 1st 2016 © MIT ★ 327

    Audio visualizations in A-Frame using Web Audio (AnalyserNode)

    aframe-audioanalyser-component.min.js on GitHub

  • Auto Detect Controllers

    Michael Chen December 27th 2016 © MIT ★ 6

    Auto-Detect Controllers component for A-Frame.

    aframe-auto-detect-controllers-component.min.js on GitHub

  • Controller Cursor

    bryik July 22nd 2016 © MIT ★ 21

    Cursor component for tracked controls in A-Frame.

    aframe-controller-cursor-component.min.js on GitHub

  • Crawling Cursor

    Jun Ito ( https://twitter.com/jujunjun110 ) December 9th 2016 © MIT ★ 20

    A A-Frame component to move cursor along objects' surface.

    aframe-crawling-cursor.min.js on GitHub

  • Event Set

    Kevin Ngo May 10th 2016 © MIT ★ 7

    Component to set properties in response to events.

    aframe-event-set-component.min.js on GitHub

  • Extras: Animation Mixer

    Don McCurdy February 12th 2016 © MIT ★ 228

    Animation mixer for JSON and glTF models.

    aframe-extras.animation-mixer.min.js on GitHub

  • Extras: Grid

    Don McCurdy February 12th 2016 © MIT ★ 228

    Square grid primitive for scene debugging.

    aframe-extras.grid.min.js on GitHub

  • Extras: Json Model

    Don McCurdy February 12th 2016 © MIT ★ 228

    Loader for THREE.JSONLoader-compatible models.

    aframe-extras.json-model.min.js on GitHub

  • Extras: Object Model

    Don McCurdy February 12th 2016 © MIT ★ 228

    Loader for THREE.ObjectLoader-compatible models.

    aframe-extras.object-model.min.js on GitHub

  • Extras: Ocean

    Don McCurdy February 12th 2016 © MIT ★ 228

    Flat-shaded, animated ocean primitive and component.

    aframe-extras.ocean.min.js on GitHub

  • Extras: Tube

    Don McCurdy February 12th 2016 © MIT ★ 228

    Tube following a custom path, primitive and component.

    aframe-extras.tube.min.js on GitHub

  • Firebase

    Kevin Ngo June 1st 2016 © MIT ★ 327
